            <string language="hu">Tárcsafék motorkerékpáron</string>
            <string language="en">Brakes on a motor bike</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bremsen auf einem Bewegungsfahrrad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Freins sur un vélo de moteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Freios em uma bicicleta do motor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Freni su una bici del motore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φρένα σε ένα ποδήλατο μηχανών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Frenos en una bici del motor</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Fékezéskor a súrlódás felmelegíti a fékeket</string>
            <string language="en">When the brakes are in use the friction are makes it warm</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Hőtan,  energia,  </string>
            <string language="en">thermo dynamics,  energy,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wenn die Bremsen innen Gebrauch die Friktion sind,
sind Marken es warm</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quand les freins sont en service le frottement sont
les marques il chaud</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quando os freios são dentro uso a fricção são 
os makes ele morno</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quando i freni sono in uso l'attrito sono le 
marche esso caldo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όταν τα φρένα είναι σε χρήση η τριβή είναι την 
καθιστά θερμή</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuando los frenos son adentro uso la fricción 
están las marcas él caliente</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">thermo Dynamik, Energie,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dynamique thermo, énergie,</string>
